column4: hi. somehow i managed to screw up my kernel and couldnt boot up, and had to revert to a previos version to boot up with. is there a way to re-install the kernel that i screwed up so it works properly again? thanks.
recovery mode not works? tried live cd wit chroot?
recovery mode did not work. tried live cd and chroot to filesystem but then what
put deb files of a kernel ad run install..but i'm not sure it will work
heh just tried it no go
black screen and no disc activity
have you reinstalled windows and re-set grub?
ok, not that... cause i've had the same problem after windows reinstall..
actually it happened sometime while i was playing with plymouth
oh lol, right...tried to remove it?
no tried to use the themes
i've asked if you've tried to remove it to fix the problem..
